des:
MyCrompton products help you control home appliance.You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light.

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light. 
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust home light - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show. 
After connecting Alexa to your Crompton products in a few simple steps:
1. Download "MyCrompton" app in Android or iOS app store.
2. Register one MyCrompton account in our "MyCrompton" app.
3. You need to have some Crompton devices in hand.
4. Configure these devices in our “MyCrompton" app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "My Crompton" skills.
5. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Android, iOS or Amazon app store.
6. Configure Echo or Echo Dot with "Alexa" app.
7. Search "My Crompton" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category.
8. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
9. Input your Copy 8-digit PIN, you'll be redirect to the success page.
10. Now all setup is finished. 

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
“Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue"

If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email: iot.feedback@crompton.co.in
